backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining document, emotion, gender, geography, intention, and cleaning log types with storage maps and CRUD-style methods for logs and model data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for error-handling improvements around IC replica rejection.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions of each component and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React root container and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer, theme provider, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Recharts bar chart aggregating per-brand emotion counts from mock analysis with dataset-aware empty states and sanitized chart data.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays latest cleaning logs with expandable UI, status icons, and color-coded badges based on log status. Fetches data and shows loading, empty, and detailed log states.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Renders a confusion matrix with validation, dynamic color gradients, and adaptive text styling. Handles missing data and model-specific palettes for visualization.
frontend/src/components/DatasetUploadSta: Shows progress and status messages for dataset parsing, validation, and upload stages. Displays success, error, and detailed row statistics when applicable.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Generates a bar chart of emotion counts derived from document analyses. Includes empty-state handling and normalized emotion labeling.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Builds a pie chart and frequency table of emotion distribution using canonical ordering. Handles dataset validation and aggregates emotion totals from documents.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Radar chart comparing three ensemble models (JC, JA, JD) across precision, recall, F1, and accuracy with percentage conversion and custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying © 2025 attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Bar chart showing emotion distribution by derived gender using aggregated emotion analysis with fallback visualization states.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Geographic emotion heatmap filtering Indonesian regions, validating matrices, and scaling color intensity based on emotion counts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with route-based active states, theme toggle, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Stacked bar chart displaying purchase intention levels (high, medium, low) aggregated per brand.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Renders gender and location-based purchase intention bar charts using aggregated document data with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Builds a time-series line chart showing purchase intention trends per level using computed trend data from documents.
frontend/src/components/MarketingMixRada: Generates an 8-factor marketing mix radar chart with validation and fallback states based on computed scores.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Displays a marketing effectiveness radar chart derived from computed funnel metrics with validation handling.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Shows a bar chart comparing model precision, recall, and F1-score, converting metrics to percentages with tooltips and empty states.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Computes and visualizes a psycho-social heatmap matrix across UTAUT2 dimensions and emotions with validation and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Renders a pie chart showing purchase intention distribution using fetched documents and computed levels.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Displays the five most recent analyzed documents with mock emotion results and confidence badges.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Builds a line chart tracking emotion frequencies over grouped time periods derived from documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries and mutations for fetching documents, uploading content, and triggering related backend processes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables including chart and confusion‑matrix color palettes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/confusionMatrixPalettes: Defines model-specific confusion‑matrix color palettes, normalizes model names, and provides legend swatch generation.
frontend/src/lib/csvRfc4180.ts: Implements an RFC4180‑compliant CSV parser handling quotes, escapes, and newlines, plus utilities for stats and field trimming.
frontend/src/lib/datasetIngestion.ts: Provides CSV/JSON dataset ingestion with header normalization, text‑field recovery, validation, and intention‑field handling.
frontend/src/lib/icReplicaErrors.ts: Extracts Internet Computer replica rejection details and maps them to user‑friendly and technical error messages.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes normalized marketing‑funnel metric scores from document text and aggregates them across documents.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMixMetrics.ts: Computes normalized 8P Marketing Mix factor scores from document text based on keyword heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Provides mock EV brand detection and simulated emotion analysis with heuristic keyword scoring.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Computes deterministic emotion categories and UTAUT2 psycho‑social scores from document text.
frontend/src/lib/purchaseIntentionAggreg: Aggregates purchase‑intention scores and levels across documents, including brand‑level and trend summaries.
frontend/src/lib/purchaseIntentionDeriva: Derives deterministic purchase‑intention scores and levels from text using hashing and keyword adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/reportPdfExport.ts: Handles client‑side PDF exporting via browser print dialog with optional filename settings.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports by analyzing emotions, psycho‑social dimensions, marketing metrics, and brand mentions.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Defines bilingual UI labels and templates for strategic report localization in English and Indonesian.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Provides utilities for determining visualization state, sanitizing numeric data, safe array access, emotion label normalization, and related helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Displays emotion analysis with filtering, search, visualizations, and document deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Handles document uploads, text analysis, dataset ingestion, and shows overview charts and recent analysis.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Shows model performance metrics, confusion matrices, and dataset reset logic with model switching.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Computes and visualizes purchase intention statistics and related demographic and trend charts.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: A settings UI allowing users to configure model toggles, ensemble defaults, thresholds, and adaptive options, with save notification support.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Generates and displays a strategic report from documents with locale switching and options to copy, print, or export the report.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, components, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking versions, known upload issues, and feature requirements related to IC0508 canister-stopped error handling.
